item.title: cloud_provider
item.description: cloudprovider.Interface 在 Kubernetes v1.6，引入了 Cloud Controller Manager（CCM），目的就是最终替代 Cloud Provider。截止到最新的 Kubernetes v1.11，还是处于 beta 阶段。 Cloud Provider 的作用 在 Kubernetes 中有三个组件对 Cloud Provider 有依赖，分别是： - kube-controller-manager - kubelet - kube-apiserver alicloud https://github.com/kubernetes/cloud-provider-alibaba-cloud/blob/b83e89ae7bbd482fbabac79d2704c1266092c0a9/docs/getting-started.md Update kubelet info with provider id info and restart kubelet:You should provide –hostname-override=${REGION_ID}.${INSTANCE_ID} –provider-id=${REGION_ID}.${INSTANCE_ID} arguments in all of your kubelet unit file. The format is ${REGION_ID}.${INSTANCE_ID}. See kubelet.service for more details.
